comments:
1.  Create a Java Project
2.  Add Junit Library to the project
3.  Add a testcase to the project
4.  Select the project, RMC->PDE->Convert to Plugin Project

Created an attachment (id=68375)
Patch for bug 188428

If the manifest bundle name and symbolic name do not exist (as would be the case for converting a Java project with no manifest file, for instance) then an NPE is encountered trying to create a new name out of a non-existent ID.

Bundle-Name creation now uses the newly generated Bundle-SymbolicName if none existed before, so the problem has disappeared. :)

Patch looks good.

This was my fault, I should have caught this problem in the patch I commited for the NPE when trying to create a build.xml after converting.  Seems that this week is just not my week.
